attributes.action: Restore funding to the ACF and TA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The govenment have decieded to stop all funding to the TA this then effects the ACF because they use the same funds as the TA. If this does not stop the Army Cadet Force will end after a amazing 150 years of service. this can not happen so please sign the petition and save the acf with all the great work it does for the young people of this great country.

rejection.details: After reviewing the situation the PM, Defence Secretary, CGS and the Chancellor decided that an additional £20m would be found from the Treasury Reserve to ensure all normal training for TA members could continue as before.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
